name: Sniffy Clean
description:
TO PLAY

-start game

visitsniffy-clean.glitch.me on a touch screen-enabled device, 2 players required

CONTROLS
(on phone screen)

left red button- turn left

right red button - turn right

both red buttons- move forward

dragging on green square - move trunk nozzle

MANDATORY CONTROL SCHEME: you must control the trunk nozzle (dragging on the green part of the screen) with your NOSE. 


HAVE FUN!
